participant_1.background:
I've lived in many places, but I grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
I'm not a morning person, but I love reading mystery novels.
I am a welder who is passionate about the craft and is always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
i am not married.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films.
i am in art school.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.
i have lived a very sheltered life.

content.text: I'm not a morning person either, but I love reading mystery novels. What's your favorite mystery novel?
I like The Murder of Roger Ackroyd by Agatha Christie, but I also like the Poirot series.
Poirot is a great character! I like the Miss Marple series as well.
I've never read any of the Miss Marple books. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're really good. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to write short films in my free time. I'm also in art school.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try writing short films.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. What kind of films do you like to write?
I like to write comedies and dramas.
Those are my favorite genres too!
We should collaborate on a film sometime!
